method.text: Melt half the butter in a large pan, add the onion, and saute for 3 min or until softened. Stir in the milk, cloves, seasoning and allspice and simmer very gently for 10 min.
Stir in the breadcrumbs and simmer very gently for 2 min, or until thickened. Remove from heat and stir in remaining butter until melted.
Spoon into a warmed serving bowl. Sprinkle with a little allspice and serve.
